title: Cultivating a greener future: Exploiting trichoderma derived secondary metabolites for fusarium wilt management in peas
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Amna Rauf, Muhammad Nasir Subhani, Maroof Siddique, Habiba Shahid, Muhammad Bilal Chattha, Abdulwahed Fahad Alrefaei, Syed Atif Hasan Naqvi, Haider Ali, Rosa Sanchez Lucas
